title: Getting Started with Laravel 11: What's New
excerpt: Explore the latest features in Laravel 11 and learn how to upgrade your existing projects to take advantage of new improvements.
content:
# Getting Started with Laravel 11: What's New

Laravel 11 brings exciting new features and improvements that make PHP development even more enjoyable...

## Streamlined Application Structure

One of the most noticeable changes in Laravel 11 is the streamlined application structure...

## Per-Second Rate Limiting

Laravel 11 introduces per-second rate limiting, giving you more granular control...

## Improved Queue Performance

The queue system has received significant performance improvements...
author: John Developer

title: Building Real-Time Features with Livewire 3
excerpt: Learn how to create interactive, real-time user interfaces with Laravel Livewire 3 without writing JavaScript.
content:
# Building Real-Time Features with Livewire 3

Livewire 3 makes it incredibly easy to build real-time, reactive interfaces...

## Why Livewire?

Livewire allows you to build dynamic interfaces using only PHP...

## Getting Started

First, install Livewire in your Laravel project...
author: John Developer

title: Next.js 16: The Future of React Frameworks
excerpt: Discover the groundbreaking features in Next.js 16, including Turbopack, React Compiler, and improved caching APIs.
content:
# Next.js 16: The Future of React Frameworks

Next.js 16 represents a significant leap forward in React framework development...

## Turbopack is Now Stable

Turbopack is now the default bundler...

## React Compiler Support
